# Tree

A tree with secondary actions in each tree item. Created to test how best to handle additional interactive items within compound widgets like trees, tablists, grids, and listboxes.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute           | Description                                                                       | Type                    | Default     |
| ------------------ | ------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------- | ----------- |
| `items`            | --                  | Array of name/value options                                                       | `TreeItem[]`            | `[]`        |
| `label`            | `label`             | Accessible name for tree                                                          | `string`                | `undefined` |
| `secondaryActions` | `secondary-actions` | Include secondary actions inside or outside the treeitem For support testing only | `"inside" \| "outside"` | `undefined` |
